name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Pripyat benchmark
content:
game:
  arch: win64
  custom-name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Call of Pripyat benchmark
  exe: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64/drive_c/Program Files
    (x86)/.exe
  prefix: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64
installer:
- execute:
    command: mv -v $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64 /tmp/dump
    description: Removing any existing winesteam-prefixes ...
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64-bit prefix ...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64
- task:
    app: stalker_pripyat_bench
    arch: win64
    description: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Call of Pripyat benchmark ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    arch: win64
    description: Visual C++ 2017 libraries ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64
- task:
    app: win81
    arch: win64
    description: Windows version 8.1 ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64
- task:
    app: dxvk
    arch: win64
    description: Vulkan ...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64
- write_file:
    content: cd $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64/drive_c && WINEPREFIX="$HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64"
      ./S.T.A.L.K.E.R.:_Call_of_Pripyat_benchmark.sh
    description: Creating S.T.A.L.K.E.R.:_Call_of_Pripyat_benchmark.sh with prefix
      ...
    file: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64/drive_c/S.T.A.L.K.E.R.:_Call_of_Pripyat_benchmark.sh
- chmodx: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64/drive_c/S.T.A.L.K.E.R.:_Call_of_Pripyat_benchmark.sh
- execute:
    command: rm $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runners/winesteam/prefix64/drive_c/SteamSetup.exe
    description: Clean-up ...
system:
  xboxdrv: xboxdrv
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
